word:
“The next morning she took breakfast with us. Soon after, as Elder White was reading from the fifth chapter of James, for family worship, the doctor came into the hall, and, as usual, went up stairs to visit his patient. Not finding her there, he hurried down and with a look of alarm opened the door of the large kitchen where we were all sitting, 
200
his patient in our midst. He gazed upon her with astonishment and at length ejaculated, ‘So Frances is better!’
